module.name: Time Conditions
module.description: Creates a condition where calls will to one of two destinations (eg, an extension, IVR, ring group..) based on the time and/or date. This can be used for example to ring a receptionist during the day, or go directly to an IVR at night.
module.changelog: *2.3* First release for FreePBX 2.2 - Fixed compatibility issue with new UI
